about:
I am a Software development specialist since 2008. Deeply interested and involved in the Client's business. I try to help beyond just software development. My consulting and entrepreneurial experience help me to advise on a call on the delivery roadmap, complexity and risks and help to craft the best solution fit for your idea. I'm flexible, extendable, and ready to solve all kinds of challenges for your business using cutting-edge web technologies. 

 Top 5 reasons why you should work with me: 
 ✓ Expert level 
 ✓ Less hassle, more work 
 ✓ Result oriented 
 ✓ Budget-friendly 

 Let's discuss how my attitude and expertise can contribute to your project. Just drop me a line!
